interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Operation.RapidModeTimed
interface.description: This interface is for controlling a rapid mode of a device that has a limited duration.

property.name: RapidModeTimeRemaining
property.description: Time remaining in rapid mode in minutes. Zero indicates not in rapid mode.

property.name: MaxTime
property.description: Maximum rapid mode set time. Does not change to accomodate already in rapid mode, may generate an InternalState error.
